name: aad-update-m365-global-unified-settings
title: Update Global Microsoft 365 Group Settings
shortDescription: Configuring Microsoft 365 Group settings is essential for ensuring a secure and compliant environment. This script can be utilized to set up different group settings, such as naming policies and guest access.
longDescription: Managing Microsoft 365 Group settings is crucial for maintaining a compliant and secure environment.PowerShell and Microsoft Graph can be used to configure various group settings, including naming policies, guest access, and more.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
